definition: to make active or more active
details:
verb
- to make active or more active
= example: to make active or more active
- to make substances radioactive
= example: to make substances radioactive
- to aerate sewage so as to favor the growth of organisms that decompose organic matter
= example: to aerate sewage so as to favor the growth of organisms that decompose organic matter
- to make more adsorptive
= example: to make more adsorptive
- to put in motion or move to act
= example: to put in motion or move to act
= synonyms: trip
